resources.string: To use BUFLEXZ, please grant the following permissions\nplease grant the following permissions.

to allow notifications.

What to do when you leave your account

Please note that the account you are using cannot be restored once the withdrawal is completed.\n\nPlease note that all app usage history provided by BUFLEXZ will be deleted, and your points, buff coins, and lucky balls will be destroyed.

When you choose to withdraw your membership, an email verification process will be conducted to prevent illegal theft and damage to your interests.\nAfter completing the email verification, you can apply for membership withdrawal.
There is a 14-day withdrawal waiting period after verification is completed, and you can cancel the withdrawal waiting period.
In order to prevent illegal theft and damage to your interests\nplease proceed with the email verification process.
Please tell us the reason for your withdrawal.\nWe will utilize it as important material for service improvement.
Because it is inconvenient to use and there are many obstacles

Please select a reason for withdrawal.

Please enter the verification number found in the email within 24 hours.
If you don\'t receive an email
•Make sure the email address you entered is correct.\n•Check your spam folder.\n•Clean up your mailbox.

A. The deadline is every Saturday at 8:30pm ET.
